alert.note: Alert for Ripley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 6:11PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A RAPIDLY DEVELOPING THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF RIPLEY COUNTY THROUGH 645 PM EDT... At 611 PM EDT, a rapidly developing thunderstorm was located near Osgood, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Versailles, Milan, Osgood, Holton, Napoleon, Millhousen, Benham, New Marion, Friendship, Versailles Lake, Cross Plains, Otter Village and Olean. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for southeastern Indiana. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
